attributes.additional_details:
Coronavirus the government should pay 80% of wages for employees who are not working due to COVID 19 crisis and release a grant of 5-10% UKs GDP.
The government should temporarily support workers for at least 3 months unitl this issue is not resolved.
attributes.background: The Government should pass a bill immediately to support the employees by giving them 80% of their wages at least for 3 months who are out of work due to COVID 19 crisis.
